explains: adj. 俗丽的，浮华的；穿着奢华的；闪光的；瞬间的；暴躁的；炫耀技艺的

sentences.en: He was much less flashy than his brother.
sentences.cn: 他远没有他哥哥那么华而不实。

sentences.en: I just want a good reliable car, nothing flashy.
sentences.cn: 我只要一辆性能可靠的轿车，不要华而不实的那种。

sentences.en: That's very thoughtful of you, Eric, but it will be pretty low-key, nothing flashy.
sentences.cn: 艾瑞克，你想得真周到，不过它将会很低调，不浮华。
